frontmatter.description: There's no sense in holding on to a reality that doesn't exist. Move on. Find joy in the present reality.
frontmatter.title: Release expectations enjoy reality

frontmatter.description: The story doesn't have to be perfect. Don't sit back and let it happen. Write the story.
frontmatter.title: Write the story, don't let it happen

frontmatter.description: Keep options. Pay for the insurance when there are unknowns.
frontmatter.title: Stay in control with backup plans

frontmatter.description: Generally, virtues are ideals agreed upon by most of society as being positive. These differ from values, which vary greatly for each individually. Based upon Ben Franklin's list, this is an modernized simple list of virtues.
frontmatter.title: Develop a list of virtues to guide life

frontmatter.description: Machines are made to be handled by humans to do things we are not capable upon our own. Learn to harness the power of all machines.
frontmatter.title: Machines should not be feared

frontmatter.description: Identify areas that will help most and work towards an enduring solution.
frontmatter.title: Guide towards independence

frontmatter.description: It's easier to sprint in one direction than jog in four.
frontmatter.title: Prioritize impactful projects

frontmatter.description: Make time to socialize to spark new ideas.
frontmatter.title: Socializing sparks spontaneity

frontmatter.description: Running head first into opposition won't sway anyone
frontmatter.title: Approach disagreements with open mindedness

frontmatter.description: Expect shot-notice changes. Make contingency plans. Don't get stuck without a plan.
frontmatter.title: Anticipate short notice changes
